description: Look no further for a delicious vegetarian burger recipe than our easy haloumi burger loaded with everyone's favourite squeaky cheese and sweet chilli sauce.
keywords: Burger,Fakeaway,Pescatarian,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Jan Feb 2021
name: Easy Haloumi Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 seven seeds & grains rolls, split, toasted
1 baby cos lettuce, leaves separated, torn

recipeInstructions.text: Cut haloumi into 8 slices. Pat dry with paper towels.
Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook haloumi for 1 minute on each side or until golden and warmed through.
Top roll bases with lettuce, tomato, haloumi and sauce. Sandwich with roll tops and serve with extra sauce.
